trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Rome
There were no other sightings in Rome on or around September 26th 2006
Summary: HUGE LIGHT SHINED ON ME half the backyard was GLOWING with light
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the back yard and saw this airplane up in the nights sky I started thinking come towards me all sudden this huge airplane made a turn and started coming towards me and shined a big light on me half the backyard was glowing from this then the airplane made a sharp turn and then it was out of my sight The light was very bright and was shining for about 8-10 secs I thought this airplane was going to crash on me I had never experienced such fright in my entire life!
